NAME - Variable in class elements.Element
 
NetworkManager - Class in at.RDG.network
The NetworkManager can only be instanced once and is responsible for every network communication.
NetworkMessage - Class in at.RDG.network.communication
The NetworkMessage is an envelop for all messages sent through the network.

The NetworkMessage predefined for network related messages.

A fully customizable NetworkMessage.
NetworkReader - Class in at.RDG.network.communication
The NetworkReader is a subclass of Thread which reads every incoming object of the network stream and writes it into a queue.
NetworkReader(Socket, BlockingQueue<NetworkMessage>) - Constructor for class at.RDG.network.communication.NetworkReader
 
NetworkWriter - Class in at.RDG.network.communication
The NetworkWriter is a subclass of Thread and when started it writes every object in the queue into the network stream.
NetworkWriter(Socket, BlockingQueue<NetworkMessage>) - Constructor for class at.RDG.network.communication.NetworkWriter
 
NewGame - Class in lobby
 
NewGame(String, Lobby) - Constructor for class lobby.NewGame
 
newMessage(Message) - Method in class views.Chat
Adds a new message to the list of message, delete oldest message if more than 7 messages are present.
nullImage(Element) - Static method in class at.RDG.network.communication.MapConverter
Set element's image to null, creating a new copy of the element to avoid rendering failures.
nwString - Variable in class at.RDG.network.communication.NetworkMessage
